txt_en: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
txt_cn: 保持前进动力的方法就是，一直拥有更远大的目标。
author: 迈克尔·考达

txt_en: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
txt_cn: 你今天做的事要让未来的你心存感激。
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

txt_en: Be strong and free from fear.
author: 莱拉·姬芙蒂·阿奇塔

txt_en: There is no substitute for hard work. First in, last out.
txt_cn: 没有什么能替代努力，要最先开始，最后离开。
author: Mary Callahan Erdoes

txt_en: Curiosity is the lust of the mind.
author: Thomas Hobbes

txt_en: Don't be afraid of your fears. They're there to let you know that something is worth it.
txt_cn: 别害怕自己的恐惧，它让你知道有些事情值得去做。
author: C. JoyBell C.

txt_en: A random act of kindness, no matter how small, can make a tremendous impact on someone else's life.
txt_cn: 你的一次无心的善举，不论多么微不足道，都可能对他人的生活产生巨大影响。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: I hope life isn't a big joke, because I don't get it.
txt_cn: 希望生活不是个大笑话，因为我没抓住笑点。
author: Jack Handey

txt_en: Respect other people's feelings. It might mean nothing to you, but it could mean everything to them.
txt_cn: 尊重他人的感受。这对你可能无关紧要，但对他人可能就十分重要。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: You are stronger than your challenges and your challenges are making you stronger.
txt_cn: 你比你面对的挑战更强大，而这些挑战让你变得更加坚强。
author: Karen Salmansohn

txt_en: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
txt_cn: 何谓朋友？一个灵魂孕育在两个躯体里。
author: 亚里士多德

txt_en: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
txt_cn: 要敢于冒险，你的经历是无可替代的。
author: Paulo Coelho

txt_en: Summertime is always the best of what might be.
txt_cn: 万物最美一面，总在夏季展现。
author: Charles Bowden
